title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. III, subch. B, pt. 62 - FIRE INSURANCE
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. III, subch. B, pt. 62 - FIRE INSURANCE
State Regulations

Subpart 62-1 - Renewal Certificates For Fire Insurance (§ 62-1.1 to 62-1.2)

Subpart 62-2 - REPORTS TO CENTRAL ORGANIZATION (§ 62-2.0 to 62-2.4)

Subpart 62-3 - Standard Fire Claim Form (§ 62-3.0 to 62-3.2)

Subpart 62-4 - Anti-arson Application (§ 62-4.0 to 62-4.3)

Subpart 62-5 - Supplemental Fire Claim Form (§ 62-5.0 to 62-5.6)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. III, subch. B, pt. 62

Statutory authority: Insurance Law, §§ 201, 301, 318, 319, 403 [e], 2601, 3403, 3413, 3432

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
